sections.name: Control Room
sections.description: The central command center of the station.
sections.interestingFact: The control room has a panoramic view of the surrounding space.

sections.name: Engineering
sections.description: The area responsible for the maintenance of the station's systems.
sections.interestingFact: Engineering is the only section on the station with a zero-gravity work environment.

sections.name: Science Lab
sections.description: The area dedicated to scientific research and experimentation.
sections.interestingFact: The science lab boasts the station's largest collection of plant specimens.

sections.name: Medical Bay
sections.description: The area dedicated to medical care and treatment.
sections.interestingFact: The medical bay is equipped with a state-of-the-art holographic surgical system.

sections.name: Living Quarters
sections.description: The area where the crew resides and relaxes when off-duty.
sections.interestingFact: The living quarters are decorated with art created by previous station crews.
